channel.title: How do i change the cords where my npcs are?
channel.description: i added nomad,but i don't know where he is,how do i change ,find,and make a tele for him?

item.title: How do i change the cords where my npcs are?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

To make a command tele, (not sure if this is what you wanted, :P, but it will suffice).

Get the coords of Nomad in the file i told you earlier.

Add this to your commands file.

if (playerCommand.equals("nomad")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(XXXX, YYYY, 0, "modern"); }

Replace XXXX with the X coords (the first ones)
Replace YYYY with the Y coords (the second ones)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the cords where my npcs are?

item.title: How do i change the cords where my npcs are?
item.dc:creator: @yoyoiowndude yoyoiowndude
item.description:
@yoyoiowndude wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:2, topic:440813”]Check the npcspawn.cfg (Or something similar) to get the NPC spawn coords.

To add a tele, there are different ways depending on the source. Which base is it?[/quote]
It is torvapkz/Project insanity.
